alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bonner and northeastern Pend Oreille Counties through 400 PM PDT... At 327 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Nordman, or 33 miles west of Bonners Ferry. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Bonner and northeastern Pend Oreille Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
